column1: # Default directory names to ignore --- nimf

column2: you can copy this file to ~/.config/nimf/ignore.csv to customize your blacklist.

column1: # Count your directory sizes with `f -tdi -d1 -e 'echo $(f {} | wc -l) {}' | sort -n` to find others to ignore.
# Drop the `-d1` to recurse. See `util/fmeasure.sh` to time crawling.
